job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Edina MNltbrgtltbrgtAs a member of the WEX Health Platform Services team the Software Engineer role will work closely with the Application Security Architect and Enterprise Architecture to enhance the security of our systems by analyzing design and architecture of existing systems with an eye to security gaps issues and potential improvements Additionally will perform ethical hacks design reviews security code reviews and analyze security assessments from external security firms Confirmed issues will be reported as bugs and issues will be researched and analyzed to propose solid fixes via documented solutions andor example code This individual will see resolution of issues through to completionltbrgtltbrgtIn addition this role will work with project teams during all phases of projects where application development may be required from a Platform Services perspective One example is platform solutions that interface with third party Vendor SAAS solutions such as Sengrid and TwilioltbrgtltbrgtThis role will also keep current with security industry best practices and use such knowledge to contribute to security policies procedures and development team training programs Members of this team are expected to actively participate in all stages of the development lifecycle and work closely with representatives from other teams such as QA Product Development Database and ITltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWe Look For The Following In Our Engineersltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Solid understanding of software development principles and design patterns and strong knowledge of programming languages ltligtltligt Solid understanding of coding practices and design principles ltligtltligt Fix and test reported issues ltligtltligt Ability to create new software designs and evolve existing designs to meet customer requirements and deliver products and solutions effectively ltligtltligt Collaborate with senior team members to understand and execute on software projects ltligtltligt Be an owner of our process and team culture continually iterating on and improving how we build products ltligtltligt Passionate about technology and security and always expanding their knowledge of future technologies ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum Requirements And Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related area or equivalent education or work experience ltligtltligt 57 years of development experience in web technologies objectoriented languages web services and unit testing ltligtltligt 7 years of experience in SQL Server TSQL ltligtltligt Experience troubleshooting customer problems and responding to customer requests ltligtltligt Experience developing in NET frameworks eg ASPNET C WCF preferred ltligtltligt Common JavaScript frameworks jQuery etc ltligtltligt Excellent communication skills ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtExtra Consideration Given To The Followingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Application Security Frameworks and Principles ltligtltligt Prior experience in security features or defensive measures such as OWASP recommendations ltligtltligt Web Application Security practices OWASP etc ltligtltligt Experience developing in the agile process ltligtltligt Unit testing ltligtltligt Domaindriven design ltligtltligt ORM Frameworks NHibernate Active Record etc ltligtltligt Application Architecture experience ltligtltligt Mobile development experience ltligtltligt Experience with SSOFederation  SAML OpenID ConnectOAuth WSFederation ltbrgtltligtltulgtPosted Today Full time R4771ltbrgtltbrgtWEX is a leading financial technology service provider across a wide spectrum of sectors including fleet travel and healthcare We hire people who share our passion for continuous innovation and client service that is unparalleled in the industry Offering comprehensive and market competitive benefits our offerings are designed to
